title: MGS4 Codec Screen Text
content:
I was playing MGS4 this weekend and my typophile senses were tingling.

During the in-game conversations between the main character and a remote character the text of the conversation would be shown on screen.

It looked great on my TV and I wanted to know what it was. The most unique thing was the slanted stroke under the eye of the “e”.

Also, it looks like a rounded sans in the screen grab, but I’m not entirely sure it is.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081013111037im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/CloseupMSG4txt_6074.gif)

author: Asvetic

comments.content:
Boy, I really stumped them with this one...

Stephen. Jan. Mike. Angel. Anyone?!
I think it is a latin alphabet characters of a Japanese font, [Rodin](http://web.archive.org/web/20081013111037/http:/www.fontworks.co.jp/typography/fontsample/classic/rodin_db.html).
You might stump me, but you can’t stump Akira. :D
Sweet Akira! Now to find a distributor, or an English translation of the site. That is such a sweet screen font. Simple and clean.
Sorry Florian, you’ll get it next time!
